name: claude-delegator/commands 模块
description: [模块级] claude-delegator 项目的 commands 模块 (source)。来源: https://github.com/jarrodwatts/claude-delegator

genes.title: commands 模块说明
genes.content:
| Command | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| `/claude-delegator:setup` | Configure MCP server and install rules |
| `/claude-delegator:uninstall` | Remove MCP config and rules |

---

name: claude-delegator/prompts 模块
description: [模块级] claude-delegator 项目的 prompts 模块 (source)。来源: https://github.com/jarrodwatts/claude-delegator

genes.title: prompts 模块说明
genes.content:
Expert prompts live in `prompts/`. Each follows the same structure:
- Role definition and context
- Advisory vs Implementation modes
- Response format guidelines
- When to invoke / when NOT to invoke

Edit these to customize expert behavior for your workflow.

---
